channel.title: Difficulty Not Affecting Damage Dealt By Player
channel.description:
Damage inflicted by the player doesn't seem to be affected by game difficulty.
No matter which difficulty I have the game set to, and no matter what values I have set for [b]sk_dmg_inflict_scale1 [/b](easy), [b]sk_dmg_inflict_scale2[/b] (normal), and [b]sk_dmg_inflict_scale3[/b] (hard), enemies require the same amount of shots/damage to be killed.
Since the difficulty descriptions state that they should be affecting player damage, this seems to be a glitch.
(There seems to be no problems with damage dealt [i]to [/i]the player--difficulty appears to be working fine in that regard.)
